alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 9:14AM EST until January 25 at 9:01AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina...North Carolina... Great Pee Dee River At Pee Dee affecting Marion and Florence Counties. Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Pee Dee River at Pee Dee. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, flooding will affect swamp and timberlands while also disrupting logging operations. Equipment not previously moved will remain trapped. Some farmland will have minor flooding especially around Brittons Neck. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening and continue falling to 18.7 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
